title: Q&A with Book Signing: Isobelle Carmody
description: Join us for an intimate evening with renowned author Isobelle Carmody, as we explore her fantasy and sci-fi worlds, with an opportunity to have your books personally signed.
imgalttext: A portrait photo of Isobelle Carmody.

title: Spoken Word Poetry - The meaning of Joy
description: Let poetry ignite your soul as we explore the essence of joy through captivating spoken word performances.
imgalttext: A photo of a girl with arms stretched wide beside her, staring out over an ocean at sunset.
